de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.data

Class OMHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.data.OMHelper

  • public abstract class OMHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Public abstract class OMHelper providing helper methods for writing simulation logs and doing calculations. Can not be instantiated.
    Author:
    A. Schoedon

    • Method Detail

      • setLogOutput

        public static void setLogOutput(java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.String logType)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the log-writer, creates a filename based on the path and the project type and finally initializes the log writer.
        Parameters:
        path - The complete path and file name of the OMB or OMS object.
        logType - The type of the current log to identify the log file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If creating log file or writing logs fails.

      • isLogOutputEnabled

        public static boolean isLogOutputEnabled()
        Indicates whether a logoutput buffer is initialized or not. Only writes log messages if true.
        Returns:
        True if a logoutput buffer is initialized.

      • calculateCV

        public static double calculateCV(double arithMean,
                 double stdDeviation)
        Calculates the variation coefficient using the arithmetric mean and standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        arithMean - The arithmetric mean.
        stdDeviation - The standard deviation.
        Returns:
        The variations coefficient.

      • calculateQD

        public static double calculateQD(double q5,
                 double q95)
        Calculates the quantile deviations using the quantiles 5 and 95.
        Parameters:
        q5 - The quantile 5.
        q95 - The quantile 95).
        Returns:
        The quantile deviation.

      • calculateGSD

        public static double calculateGSD(long n,
                  double[] values,
                  double geoMean)
        Calculates the geometric standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of values.
        values - An array of values.
        geoMean - The geometric mean of the values.
        Returns:
        The geometric standard deviation.

      • calculateFactorial

        public static int calculateFactorial(int n)
        Calculates the factorial of n!.
        Parameters:
        n - Integer value which is used to calculate factorial of n!.
        Returns:
        The factorial n!.

      • getTimestamp

        public static java.lang.String getTimestamp()
        Gets the current timestamp using the format "dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm:ss,SSS ".
        Returns:
        The current timestamp.

      • writeLog

        public static void writeLog(java.lang.String newLine)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a new line with a timestamp to the log file using the BufferedReader. Call this method once per line to write.
        Parameters:
        newLine - A string to write into the log file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If creating log file or writing logs fails.

      • closeLog

        public static void closeLog()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Helper method to close the log file and the BufferedReader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If closing log file or writing logs fails.
